H6684.def: = action by which someone abstains from eating food, sometimes accompanied by mourning, prayer, and sacrifices, ◄ as a result of grief, repentance, or done as part of a ritual; ► its primary intention is to humble oneself before God and so be pleasing to him

H3201.def: mostly used in a negated clause; = state in which an activity cannot be carried out, as a result of a lack of skill, strength, or ability of the agent, or other circumstances that make the activity impossible

H7725.def: = action by which humans face a direction different from the one they were facing before

H1980.def: = process by which liquids or other inanimate objects move from one place to another

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H1339.def: = woman, also known as {L:Bath-Shua<SDBH:בַּת־שׁוּעַ>}; ◄ daughter of {L:Eliam<SDBH:אֱלִיעָם>} (also known as {L:Ammiel<SDBH:עַמִּיאֵל>}); wife of {L:Uriah<SDBH:אוּרִיָּה>}, and later of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}

H5162.def: = causative action by which humans or deities seek to make (other) humans feel relief after a time of grief, anxiety, or fear

H802.def: = woman of marriagable age or older, whether married or not

H7901.def: = state or action by which a human being or animal is in or assumes a horizontal position; ► in order to rest, sleep, or have sex with someone, or because of being unable to stand up as a result of weakness or death; ≈ sometimes associated with security

H7121.def: = action by which humans or deities speak with a loud voice, often to draw attention to themselves or to their situation and expecting someone to respond in one way or another

H8034.def: = one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity

H8010.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}; tribe of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► king of Judah and {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}; given the name {L:Jedidiah<SDBH:יְדִידְיָהּ>} at his birth

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H157.def: = state in which humans or deities experience a feeling of affection for a person, an object, or a practice

22.gl: to lie with > to sleep with

H7971.def: = causative action by which humans or deities commission one or more agents to go to a certain individual or place in order to perform a certain task

H3027.def: = the lower part of the upper limb of the human body, which in some contexts may include the full arm, ► apart from basic human activities such as holding, giving and taking, working, beating, also used in rituals around blessings, oaths, and prayer; ≈ used figuratively in expressions involving strength, control, responsibility, punishment; ≈ possibly used as a euphemism for the male genitals

H5030.def: = male person speaking on behalf of a deity

H7121.def: = action by which humans or deities speak with a loud voice, often to draw attention to themselves or to their situation and expecting someone to respond in one way or another

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H8034.def: = one or more words by which a person, deity, place or object is known, addressed, remembered, or referred to; ≈ regarded as a core element of one's identity

H3041.def: = name given to King {L:Solomon<SDBH:שְׁלֹמֹה>} at his birth

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H3097.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Zeruiah<SDBH:צְרוּיָה>}, sister of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}; ► chief of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}'s army

H3898.def: = action by which humans ingest food

H7237.def: = town, also known as {L:Rabbah of the Ammonites<SDBH:רַב>}, ◄ and located in Ammon; ► capital of the Ammonite kingdom, first conquered by {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} on their way from {L:Egypt<SDBH:מִצְרַיִם>}, and later again by {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}

H5983.def: = nation; ◄ situated E. of river {L:Jordan<SDBH:יַרְדֵּן>}; according to {S:00101903800100200} founded by {L:Ben-Ammi<SDBH:בֶּן־עַמִּי>}, son of {L:Lot<SDBH:לֹוט>}

H3920.def: = action by which humans or animals take control of (other) humans, animals, towns or land, usually with violence

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H4410.def: = state in which a person or deity has been entrusted with the office of {L:king<SDBH:מֶלֶךְ>} or {L:queen<SDBH:מַלְכָּה>}

H5892.def: = relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent {L:villages<SDBH:חָצֵר>}, {L:settlements<SDBH:בַּת>}, and {L:pasturelands<SDBH:מִגְרָשׁ>}; ≈ associated with strength and security

H3097.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Zeruiah<SDBH:צְרוּיָה>}, sister of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}; ► chief of {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}'s army

H7971.def: = causative action by which humans or deities commission one or more agents to go to a certain individual or place in order to perform a certain task

H4397.def: = a human or supernatural being who carries a message on behalf of someone else

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H3898.def: = action by which humans ingest food

H7237.def: = town, also known as {L:Rabbah of the Ammonites<SDBH:רַב>}, ◄ and located in Ammon; ► capital of the Ammonite kingdom, first conquered by {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>} on their way from {L:Egypt<SDBH:מִצְרַיִם>}, and later again by {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}

H3920.def: = action by which humans or animals take control of (other) humans, animals, towns or land, usually with violence

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H4325.def: = water as the indispensible liquid on which the existence of all life depends, used for drinking, preparing food, washing, irrigating, etc.; found under the earth, on the earth, and above the earth; sometimes used as a euphemism to denote certain body liquids; ≈ associated with abundance and refreshment, but also with instability, and danger, etc.

H5892.def: = relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent {L:villages<SDBH:חָצֵר>}, {L:settlements<SDBH:בַּת>}, and {L:pasturelands<SDBH:מִגְרָשׁ>}; ≈ associated with strength and security

H6258.def: = a reference to the actual time when a particular event takes place

H622.def: = process by which humans come together from different places and form a group for a common purpose, such as for a meeting or for war

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H3499.def: = what remains in existence after part of the original quantity has disappeared or has been used or dealt with in a certain way; used for humans, animals, plants, and inanimate objects

H2583.def: = state in which an individual or group of people dwells at a certain location for a limited period of time and often for a specific purpose

H5892.def: = relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent {L:villages<SDBH:חָצֵר>}, {L:settlements<SDBH:בַּת>}, and {L:pasturelands<SDBH:מִגְרָשׁ>}; ≈ associated with strength and security

H1980.def: = process by which liquids or other inanimate objects move from one place to another

H3898.def: = action by which humans ingest food

H3920.def: = action by which humans or animals take control of (other) humans, animals, towns or land, usually with violence

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H5850.def: = circular or semi-circular ornamental headdress, ◄ usually made out of precious metals and decorated with jewels, ► worn by kings, priests, and officials as a symbol of authority and status; also given to women by their suitors to win their affection

H7218.def: = upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities

H4428.def: = supreme secular and male ruler of a nation or people; ≈ associated with authority, power, honor, but also with justice; also used as a reference to one's deity

H4948.def: = a measure of the heaviness of an object

H2091.def: = metal of a bright yellow color, ◄ found in rocks and alluvial deposits ► and used as a monetary standard and in jewellery and plating; ≈ associated with wealth, beauty, and prosperity

H3368.def: = state in which humans or objects are considered valuable and desirable

H68.def: = hard, heavy, and strong substance, ◄ very commonly found in nature,  ► which can be hewn into different shapes by a craftsman

H3318.def: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position

H5892.def: = relatively large and permanent population center, usually surrounded by a wall and surrounded by a number of dependent {L:villages<SDBH:חָצֵר>}, {L:settlements<SDBH:בַּת>}, and {L:pasturelands<SDBH:מִגְרָשׁ>}; ≈ associated with strength and security

H3318.def: = action by which humans, animals, or objects leave a certain place or position

H834.def: = a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner

H7760.def: = action by which individuals or groups of humans place themselves in a certain position or configuration

H4050.def: = heavy metal instrument with a wide rough surface, like that of a file; ► pushed and pulled across the surface of the stone until it is quite smooth

H1270.def: = a strong, hard magnetic silvery-grey metal, ► used in construction and manufacturing; ≈ associated with strength and permanence

H2757.def: = substance ◄ made out of pressed curds, ► used as food

H4037.def: = a heavy-bladed tool used for chopping wood

H4404.def: exact meaning unknown: = small, rectangular wooden container (about 20‑25 by 10 centimeters) ► used to form bricks in equal sizes; or: = large outdoor oven ► for baking bricks to harden them

H6213.def: = causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them

H5983.def: = nation; ◄ situated E. of river {L:Jordan<SDBH:יַרְדֵּן>}; according to {S:00101903800100200} founded by {L:Ben-Ammi<SDBH:בֶּן־עַמִּי>}, son of {L:Lot<SDBH:לֹוט>}

H7725.def: = action by which humans face a direction different from the one they were facing before

H3389.def: = town, formerly referred to as {L:Salem<SDBH:שָׁלֵם>} and {L:Jebus<SDBH:יְבוּס>};◄ located on Mt. {L:Zion<SDBH:צִיֹּון>}; territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}; ► conquered by king {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}, who made it the capital of his kingdom
